name: Magic War
description:
he old magician was expelled from magical society. Being lonely and embittered magician, he decided to take revenge on all his offenders and, having gone over to the dark side, he set about destroying all magicians on earth.

Magic War - Top Down Shooter with magic elements. Every enemy can kill you easy, let's dodge magic balls and set your enemies on fire. Your skills will be very useful to you. May the magic be with you!

Game Features:
- Beautiful Pixel Art
- Dynamic Music
- 30 levels
- Hardcore
